file.name: sp_crawler_child_spec.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: kearch specialist search engine crawler-child API
  description: kearch specialist search engine crawler-child API
  version: 0.1.0
servers:
  - url: '{scheme}://{sp_host}:{port}/sp/crawler-child'
    variables:
      scheme:
        enum:
          - http
          - https
        default: http
      sp_host:
        default: sp-crawler-child.kearch.svc.cluster.local
      port:
        default: '10080'
paths:
  /crawl_a_page:
    get:
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: url
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  url:
                    type: string
                  title:
                    type: string
                  text:
                    type: string
                  tfidf:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tfidf'
                  inner_links:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: string
                  outer_links:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: string
components:
  schemas:
    Tfidf:
      type: object
      additionalProperties:
        type: number
        format: float
      example: {'lisp': 0.91}
